Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    universum.studios.android.preference.ListPreference
    Use CollectionPreference instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesConfig
    To control library logs use PreferencesLogging utility class.
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.Mode
    Use @SharedPreferencesPolicy.FileMode instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.MODE_APPEND
    Use SharedPreferencesPolicy.FILE_MODE_APPEND instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.MODE_ENABLE_WRITE_AHEAD_LOGGING
    This flag is appropriate only for database files.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.MODE_MULTI_PROCESS
    Deprecated due to deprecation in the framework. See Context.MODE_MULTI_PROCESS.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.MODE_PRIVATE
    Use SharedPreferencesPolicy.FILE_MODE_PRIVATE instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    universum.studios.android.preference.SharedPreference.attachKey(Resources)
    Due to dropped support of keys specified via resource ids, this method becomes obsolete.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.defaultSharedPreferencesName(Context)
    Use SharedPreferencesPolicy.defaultPreferencesName(Context) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.SharedPreference.getKeyRes()
    Use SharedPreference.getKey() instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.getMode()
    Use PreferencesManager.getPreferencesFileMode() instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.getSharedPreferences()
    Use SimpleSharedPreferencesFacade.getPreferences() instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.getSharedPreferencesName()
    Use PreferencesManager.getPreferencesName() instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.SharedPreference.retrieve(SharedPreferences)
    Use SharedPreference.getFromPreferences(SharedPreferences) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.SharedPreference.save(SharedPreferences)
    Use SharedPreference.putIntoPreferences(SharedPreferences) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.setMode(int)
    The new implementation of preferences manager does not support changing of preferences file mode after the manager has been initialized.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.setSharedPreferencesName(String)
    The new implementation of preferences manager does not support changing of preferences name after the manager has been initialized.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    universum.studios.android.preference.ArrayPreference(int, T)
    Use ArrayPreference.ArrayPreference(String, Object) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.BooleanPreference(int, Boolean)
    Use BooleanPreference.BooleanPreference(String, Boolean) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.EnumPreference(int, E)
    Use EnumPreference.EnumPreference(String, Enum) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.FloatPreference(int, Float)
    Use FloatPreference.FloatPreference(String, Float) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.IntegerPreference(int, Integer)
    Use IntegerPreference.IntegerPreference(String, Integer) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.ListPreference(int, Class<T>, List<T>)
    Use ListPreference.ListPreference(String, Class, List) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.LongPreference(int, Long)
    Use LongPreference.LongPreference(String, Long) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager(Context)
    Use PreferencesManager.PreferencesManager(Builder) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager(Context, String)
    Use PreferencesManager.PreferencesManager(Builder) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager(Context, String, int)
    Use PreferencesManager.PreferencesManager(Builder) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.SharedPreference(int, T)
    Use SharedPreference.SharedPreference(String, Object) instead.
    universum.studios.android.preference.StringPreference(int, String)
    Use StringPreference.StringPreference(String, String) instead.
